entry.title: BIP 32.5
entry.summary: In an email conversation from August 2013, Bitcoin developer Mike Hearn discussed the difficulty of analyzing hardware wallets and questioned why they are necessary if one already trusts their computer. Another participant in the conversation expressed mistrust of both hardware wallets and computers. The discussion also touched on the lack of multisig support in the first version of TREZOR and the challenges of implementing P2SH support for sending payments through Android wallets.
